title: Parameters for Synchronization of RoI Fusion Nodes

input_offset_ms.description: An array of timestamp offsets for each camera [ms].

timeout_ms.description: A timeout value can be assigned within a single frame [ms].

match_threshold_ms.description: A maximum threshold value to synchronize RoIs from multiple cameras [ms].

image_buffer_size.description: The number of image buffer size for debug.

filter_scope_minx.description: Minimum x position to be considered for debug [m].

filter_scope_miny.description: Minimum y position to be considered for debug [m].

filter_scope_minz.description: Minimum z position to be considered for debug [m].

filter_scope_maxx.description: Maximum x position to be considered for debug [m].

filter_scope_maxy.description: Maximum y position to be considered for debug [m].
